subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Philipp Grubauer, Washington’s 22-year-old German goalie, earned his first N.H.L. win by shutting down the Rangers on Sunday, who are now 5-7-1 on home ice.
snippet: Philipp Grubauer, Washington’s 22-year-old German goalie, earned his first N.H.L. win by shutting down the Rangers on Sunday, who are now 5-7-1 on home ice.
